channel.title: Capitalizing the first letter of every word
channel.description:
There are few things that make me [b]rage[/b] more than someone trying to sound smart by "Capitalizing The First Letter Of Every Word". Not only does it show that you really don't know shit about English grammar, not only does it make your messages annoying as hell to read, but it makes you look like a retard.
Sorry, but I had to bitch about it. :P This is just my ranting, if you want to take my advice: please stop capitalizing the first letter of every word. Otherwise I'll just continue to rage quietly whenever I read your posts. :(
Who else does this annoy?

item.title: Capitalizing the first letter of every word
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:1, topic:299521"][quote author=Budda link=topic=395431.msg2940462#msg2940462 date=1251842165]

So get rid of your keyboard, and for everything you write, scan it and post it as an image. Problem solved?

No. Just get a sharpie and write on your computer screen and press post???

Why aren’t you gone, you should be banned for false leaving threads.

You obviously never read the thread.

Oh that’s right, moparscapers change their mind every day.

Why are you here? Do you see any graphics boards here?

*points at
"Models
Here you can post models you have made or found for the RS2 client. "

Theres one! Whats my prize? Do I get to punch you in the jaw? Oh I hope so!
[/quote]

Laughed in real life.[/quote]

be smart it’s;
“ai lol’d irl roflmao”

sarcasm, towards what topic is about

Read full topic

item.title: Capitalizing the first letter of every word
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

d00d U Have a Problem Wif pople dat Ca’nt Post corectly? U’Re a Loser Noob den

…
…
…
…
…
[size=15pt]NO![/size]
Everyone that types like the above, “d00d, wif, dat, den”, or capitalizing each starting letter of a word, needs to stop using these forums, rip off their keyboard, or stop posting

I cut my wrists every time I see it.

Read full topic
